Ingredients.1: 3 medium purple sweet potatoes, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Poke holes all over potatoes with a fork. Arrange in a baking dish.

Directions.3: Bake in preheated oven until potatoes are easily pierced with a knife, about 45 minutes.

Directions.4: Cut potatoes in half, widthwise, on a cutting board. Scoop flesh into a mixing bowl. Add coconut milk, lime juice, salt and pepper to taste. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth.
